snippet.title: Zero Orders Tactics Trailer
snippet.description:
Zero Orders Tactics (Play on STEAM)
An experimental turn-based strategy where nothing is random, everything is predictable, but the battlefield is changing. Every turn. By you. 

Manipulate terrain, swap units, and win battles without giving a single order in this tactics puzzle with indirect control. 

Inspired by Into the Breach
